



## Toki pona

Toki Pona has nine consonants (/p, t, k, s, m, n, l, j, w/) and five vowels (/a, e, i, o, u/)

### frequency

https://github.com/o-x-e-y/oxeylyzer/blob/main/static/language_data_raw/toki_pona.json
